entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.6°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 90 %

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow late this morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning late in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
